marklogic.body:
Sadly, I think you're Spot on, groman. Even the GOP establishment has leaped aboard the Obama bandwagon, showing thereby that it is NOT Conservative (i.e., believes in the Constitution) but is only playing the game of politics for self-enrichment. The Democrats sold out in the Sixties, demonstrating it by putting McGovern up in '72.
We've that point in our Republic's life that John Locke talked about, when it's a patriotic DUTY to throw the corruptos out. It won't be fun or easy but more than America is at stake here, folks; the entire world has Depended on America to pull the economic train and set standards of decency. Once we fall, the world economy falls permanently and any hopes of decency between nations disappears.
